title: Experience Complexity-Based Pedagogical Workshop for Smart Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Science subject-matter knowledge and proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing field-applicable smart learning experiences for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design smart learning activities in science by applying the 4-Tier Pyramid of Experiential Complexity for Science Learning (PECSL).
Learners can develop three or more mobile microlearning scenarios centered on learner experience in hyper-local environments.
Learners can implement flexible learning designs that account for learner experience transformation factors in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
